name: A Storm in the Void
description:
An original science fiction adventure-RPG about leadership, regaining masculinity and the mysteries of space: A Storm in the Void.

The gameplay consists of RPG combat, puzzle solving, exploration, and there are a few important decisions to make along to the way that affect the game. The emphasis is on the story, characters and the atmosphere.

Contains some adult themes, such as suggested sex and violence.

Around 10 hours of content.

Best of all, it's completely free.
